verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Nehiloth, <S%H5155><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my words, <S%H561><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> my meditation. <S%H1901><s%>
Listen <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my cry, <S%H7773><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> and my God: <S%H430><s%> for to you will I pray. <S%H6419><s%>

My voice <S%H6963><s%> shall you hear <S%H8085><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> will I direct <S%H6186><s%> my prayer to you, and will look <S%H6822><s%> up.
For you are not a God <S%H410><s%> that has pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in wickedness: <S%H7562><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall evil <S%H7451><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> with you.
The foolish <S%H1984><s%> shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> in your sight: <S%H5869><s%> you hate <S%H8130><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>

You shall destroy <S%H6><s%> them that speak <S%H1696><s%> leasing: <S%H3577><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will abhor <S%H8581><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> and deceitful <S%H4820><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

But as for me, I will come <S%H935><s%> into your house <S%H1004><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your mercy: <S%H2617><s%> and in your fear <S%H3374><s%> will I worship <S%H7812><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Lead <S%H5148><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> because <S%H4616><s%> of my enemies; <S%H8324><s%> make your way <S%H1870><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%> before my face. <S%H6440><s%>

For there is no <S%H369><s%> faithfulness <S%H3559><s%> in their mouth; <S%H6310><s%> their inward <S%H7130><s%> part is very <S%H1942><s%> wickedness; <S%H1942><s%> their throat <S%H1627><s%> is an open <S%H6605><s%> sepulcher; <S%H6913><s%> they flatter <S%H2505><s%> with their tongue. <S%H3956><s%>

Destroy <S%H816><s%> you them, O God; <S%H430><s%> let them fall <S%H5307><s%> by their own counsels; <S%H4156><s%> cast <S%H5080><s%> them out in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> for they have rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against you.

But let all <S%H3605><s%> those that put their trust <S%H2620><s%> in you rejoice: <S%H8055><s%> let them ever <S%H5769><s%> shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, because you defend <S%H5526><s%> them: let them also that love <S%H157><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> be joyful <S%H5970><s%> in you.
For you, LORD, <S%H3068><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> with favor <S%H7522><s%> will you compass <S%H5849><s%> him as with a shield. <S%H6793><s%>
